entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
